title: Medications for Binge Eating Disorder
itunes:title: Medications for Binge Eating Disorder
description:
Is binge eating an addictive disorder or an impulse-control disorder? In this episode, Dr. Phelps summarizes the evidence of efficacy of several medications for binge eating disorder. He also discusses the psychopathology and neuropharmacology of binge eating disorder. 

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D. 
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 33
  • Prospects for New Drugs To Treat Binge Eating Disorder: Insights From Psychopathology and Neuropharmacology
